scripts.build:ssr: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:noExternal: npm run build:client && npm run build:server:noExternal
scripts.generate: vite build --ssrManifest --outDir dist/static && npm run build:server && node prerender
scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git commit -m 'docs: 更改CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release-patch: npm run pre-release && npm version patch -m "tag: 版本更新至 %s patch" && npm run branch-merge
scripts.release-minor: npm run pre-release && npm version minor -m "tag: 版本更新至 %s minor" && npm run branch-merge
scripts.release-major: npm run pre-release && npm version major -m "tag: 版本更新至 %s major" && npm run branch-merge
scripts.pre-release: git checkout develop && git pull && git checkout master && git pull && git merge develop
scripts.branch-merge: git push --tags && git push && git checkout develop && git merge master && git push
